snippet.title: Gal*Gun Returns - World Premiere Trailer
snippet.description:
Gal*Gun Returns - World Premiere Trailer
Official Web Site: http://www.galgun.com/en/R/

The Gal*Gun series is celebrating its 10th anniversary!

Gal*Gun is the bewildering story of a young man who became "super popular" with the opposite sex, and is now living the "unfortunate" life of having every lady that looks his way confessing their undying love for him. But he must steel himself and fend these would-be lovers off with his radiant gaze (known as the Pheromone Shot), as he tries to win the affections of one of the main protagonists. Gal*Gun is the crazy combination of arcade-style shooting action and dating sim that truly has no equal. 

Despite it's ridiculous premise, Gal*Gun has been universally recognized for just how well it plays as a shooting game! Many Gal*Gunners around the world have already experienced this sensation since the series debut in January of 2011, allowing the series to continue to stir the hearts of people to this day!

Time sure flies though, because next year in 2021 the Gal*Gun series celebrates its 10th anniversary!

To honor the occasion, there's no better way than to bring back the game that started it all, remastered and making it's "everywhere except Japan" debut with the release of "Gal*Gun Returns"!

For the Japanese fans (and all you crazy bilingual importers), this will feel like a warm homecoming. For the rest of the world's Gal*Gunners old and new, the time has finally come to you to experience Gal*Gun's roots with Gal*Gun Returns!

[Product Information]

Title: Gal*Gun Returns
Genre: Shooting game / Dating sim
Platforms: Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, Steam (PC)
# of Players: 1 Player
Rating: TBD
Release Date: January 28, 2021 (Nintendo Switch, Xbox One)
              2021 February (Steam)
Price: Physical Version (Nintendo Switch only)
         Asian Region Standard Retail Edition US$49.99 
       Digital Download
         US$49.99 

©INTI CREATES CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
